name: Mutimer Company v. Wagner (et al., Appellant)

judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ohidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
parties: Mutimer Company v. Wagner (et al., Appellant).

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Knight. Costs to be paid by the appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: David V. Shapiro, with him David E. Groshens and Shapiro, Rosenfeld & Sta-lberg, for appellants.
Cassin W. Graig, with him Wisler, Pearlstine, Talone & Gerber, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Mutimer Company v. Wagner (et al., Appellant).
Argued January 4, 1954.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ohidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
David V. Shapiro, with him David E. Groshens and Shapiro, Rosenfeld & Sta-lberg, for appellants.
Cassin W. Graig, with him Wisler, Pearlstine, Talone & Gerber, for appellee.
March 22, 1954:
